snippet.title: We Are One Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Work together with yourself in VR!
We Are One is a puzzle shooter where you solve mind-bending puzzles by cloning yourself and playing with time loops. Cleverly plan ahead and cooperate with your own clones - the only help you really need (and get) is yourself! 

This game is still in Development and was previously known as "Help Yourself"

Play the free version on:
App Lab: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4089073041145597/
SideQuest: https://sidequestvr.com/app/724
Steam Prolog: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1855830/
Wishlist the full Version on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1669500

Join our journey on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/nCUyAWA

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/weareflatheads
And TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@weareflatheads

We are Flat Head Studio
https://flathead-studio.com/
